import re

def extract_h3_tags(html):
    h3_tags = re.findall('', html, re.DOTALL)
    extracted_tags = []
    for tag in h3_tags:
        text = re.sub('<.*?>', '', tag)
        text = text.strip()
        extracted_tags.append({'heading': tag, 'text': text})
    return extracted_tags
